name: Bombastic Battle Arena
description:
Bombastic Battle Arena is a short arcade-style game created for Jam-Pot 2020 with the required theme "cube".

*Fullscreen recommended

*Refresh the page if it starts crashing on you

For help see guide below:

Stage 1: 1000 cube-shaped currency

Stage 2: 2000 cube-shaped currency

Stage 3: -3000 cube-shaped currency
